TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapExtension extends System.Object

summary.span: 使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web services 的 SOAP 扩展的基类。

span.span: The base class for SOAP extensions for XML Web services created using ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 允许 SOAP 相关的基础结构构建通过一种扩展机制。ASP.NET allows a SOAP-related infrastructure to be built by means of an extensibility mechanism. ASP.NET SOAP 扩展体系结构围绕扩展可检查或修改在客户端或服务器上处理的消息中的特定阶段的消息。The ASP.NET SOAP extension architecture revolves around an extension that can inspect or modify a message at specific stages in message processing on either the client or the server. ASP.NET SOAP 扩展派生自类。ASP.NET SOAP extensions derive from the class. 和方法提供替代机制，用于初始化要提高性能的 SOAP 扩展。The and methods provide alternative mechanisms for initializing the SOAP extension to enhance performance. 默认情况下，调用在每个阶段中定义为大多数的 SOAP 扩展的核心，允许要执行此特定的 SOAP 扩展的所需的行为的 SOAP 扩展。 is the heart of most SOAP extensions, as the method is called at each stage defined in , allowing the SOAP extension to perform the desired behavior of that specific SOAP extension. 为需要的 SOAP 扩展修改 SOAP 请求或 SOAP 响应为接收跨网络发送的建议的数据提供了机会。For SOAP extensions that need to modify the SOAP request or SOAP response, provides an opportunity to receive the proposed data to be sent across the wire. ## Examples 以下`TraceExtension`SOAP 扩展将 SOAP 请求和对指定的文件应用到 XML Web 服务方法时的 SOAP 响应输出。The following `TraceExtension` SOAP extension outputs the SOAP request and SOAP response to a specified file when applied to an XML Web service method. 如果安装了以下的 SOAP 扩展，以使用 XML Web 服务运行，ASPNET 用户帐户必须有权写入到在其中写入日志文件的目录。If the following SOAP extension is installed to run with an XML Web service, the ASPNET user account must have permission to write to the directory in which the log file is written. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: A memory buffer containing the SOAP request or response.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展访问包含 SOAP 请求或响应的内存缓冲区。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension access to the memory buffer containing the SOAP request or response.

returns.span: ，它表示此 SOAP 扩展可以修改的新内存缓冲区。

span.span: A representing a new memory buffer that this SOAP extension can modify.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确保具有最高优先级的 SOAP 扩展，可以修改与 SOAP 消息发送或通过网络连接返回最接近的实际数据。 ensures that SOAP extensions with the highest priority can modify the actual data closest to the SOAP message sent or returned over the wire. SOAP 扩展应保存的引用传入和从返回。SOAP extensions should save references of the passed into and the returned from . 如果 SOAP 扩展配置为使用 XML Web 服务方法中，运行传入包含在序列化的 SOAP 请求 。If the SOAP extension is configured to run with a XML Web service method, the passed into contains the serialized SOAP request at the . 类似地，返回从引用序列化发生，并因此包含中的序列化的 SOAP 响应时被写入到 。Similarily, the reference returned from is written into when the serialization occurs and thus contains the serialized SOAP response in the . ## Examples 下面的示例将保存同时传入和从返回成员变量中`oldStream`和`newStream`分别。The following example saves both the passed into and the returned from in the member variables `oldStream` and `newStream`, respectively. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.ChainStream Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展以一次执行的成本初始化特定于 XML Web services 方法的数据。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize data specific to an XML Web service method at a one time performance cost.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetInitializer(class System.Type serviceType) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetInitializer (serviceType As Type) As Object

param.name: serviceType
param.span: 实现应用 SOAP 扩展的 XML Web services 的类的类型。

span.span: The type of the class implementing the XML Web service to which the SOAP extension is applied.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展以一次执行的成本初始化特定于实现 XML Web services 的类的数据。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize data specific to a class implementing an XML Web service at a one time performance cost.

returns.span: ，SOAP 扩展将对其进行初始化以用于缓存。

span.span: The that the SOAP extension initializes for caching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重载，获取由 ASP.NET 取决于如何指定 SOAP 扩展。The overload of that gets called by ASP.NET depends on how the SOAP extension was specified. 有两个指定的 SOAP 扩展的方法：There are two methods for specifying a SOAP extension: - 将自定义特性，派生自应用，到单个 XML Web 服务方法。Apply a custom attribute, deriving from , to the individual XML Web service method. - 在 web.config 或 app.config 配置文件中添加的引用。Add a reference in either the web.config or app.config configuration files. 如果你添加到其中一个配置文件的引用，SOAP 扩展将运行该配置文件的作用域内的所有 XML Web 服务。If you add a reference to one of the configuration files, the SOAP extension runs for all XML Web services within the scope of that configuration file. 在指定时，通过引用配置文件的 SOAP 扩展 ASP.NET 时，将调用通过中的重载。When specifying, a SOAP extension by referencing a configuration file, ASP.NET invokes the overload that passes in a . 在指定扩展通过应用自定义特性时，ASP.NET 时，将调用通过中和。When specifying an extension by applying a custom attribute, ASP.NET invokes the that passes in a and a . 有关将 SOAP 扩展添加到配置文件的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f0d71bc-8faa-4730-b500-2a6c7b5d4f6b)。For details on adding SOAP extensions to a configuration file, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f0d71bc-8faa-4730-b500-2a6c7b5d4f6b). ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何一个可以将 SOAP 扩展的特定数据保存在每个 XML Web 服务为准。The following code demonstrates how one can save SOAP extension specific data on a per XML Web service basis. 如果使用配置文件而不属性配置 SOAP 扩展，SOAP 扩展可以存储为 SOAP 扩展应用到每个类的数据。If the SOAP extension is configured using a configuration file instead of an attribute, the SOAP extension can store data for each class to which the SOAP extension is applied. 此示例将保存在用于记录发送到和从 XML Web service 方法根据到缓存实现 XML Web 服务的类名称的 SOAP 消息的文件的名称。This example saves the name of a file in which to log the SOAP messages sent to and from the XML Web service method based on the name of the class implementing the XML Web service into the cache. 此代码示例是可以位于的 TraceExtension SOAP 扩展的完整代码示例的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a full code example for a TraceExtension SOAP extension that can be found in the class overview. [!code-cpp[SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type/CPP/traceextension.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type/CS/traceextension.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapExtension.GetInitializer-Type/VB/traceextension.vb#1)]

Public MustOverride Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo, attribute As SoapExtensionAttribute) As Object

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，它表示应用 SOAP 扩展的 XML Web services 方法的特定函数原型。

span.span: A representing the specific function prototype for the XML Web service method to which the SOAP extension is applied.

param.span: 应用于 XML Web services 方法的 。

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展以一次执行的成本使用应用于 XML Web services 方法的特性来初始化特定于 XML Web services 方法的数据。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize data specific to an XML Web service method using an attribute applied to the XML Web service method at a one time performance cost.

returns.span: ，SOAP 扩展将对其进行初始化以用于缓存。

span.span: The that the SOAP extension initializes for caching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用配置文件，请参阅配置 SOAP 扩展接受的重载。If the SOAP extension is configured using a configuration file see the overload that accepts a . SOAP 扩展有三个机会来初始化数据，并且它们都具有不同的用途：A SOAP extension has three opportunities to initialize data and they all have different purposes: - 类构造函数的类构造函数在每次的 SOAP 扩展实例化并通常用于初始化成员变量时调用。Class constructor - The class constructor is called every time a SOAP extension is instantiated and is typically used to initialize member variables. - - 但是，调用只是一次，第一次的 SOAP 请求对 XML Web services 方法。 - , however, is called just once, the first time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web services method. 如果自定义特性应用于 XML Web 服务方法中，调用方法。If a custom attribute is applied to the XML Web service method, the method is invoked. 这可使 SOAP 扩展，以便询问的 XML Web 服务方法有关原型信息或要访问特定于扩展的数据由类派生自传递。This allows the SOAP extension to interrogate the of an XML Web service method for prototype information or to access extension-specific data passed by a class deriving from . 返回值可由 ASP.NET 缓存并传递给后续方法。The return value is cached by ASP.NET and passed into subsequent methods. 因此，在中执行的初始化封装实质上是一次性的性能问题。Therefore, initialization done in is encapsulated essentially into a one-time performance hit. - - 每次 SOAP 请求由 XML Web 服务方法，但有类构造函数，其优点在于时会调用在中初始化传递给它。 - is called every time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web service method, but has an advantage over the class constructor, in that the initialized in is passed to it. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何获取 SOAP 特定于扩展的数据中使用的类，派生自传递，然后将其缓存中的这些数据和。The following code demonstrates how you can obtain SOAP extension-specific data passed in using a class that derives from , and then cache that data in . 此代码示例是一个完整的代码示例的一部分`TraceExtension`可以位于的 SOAP 扩展类概述。This code example is part of a full code example for a `TraceExtension` SOAP extension that can be found in the class overview. 此代码示例依赖于`TraceExtensionAttribute`正传入到`attribute`参数。This code example relies on a `TraceExtensionAttribute` being passed into the `attribute` parameter. 在完整的代码示例中，`TraceExtensionAttribute`派生自并添加`Filename`属性，它是什么将存储在缓存中。In the full code example, `TraceExtensionAttribute` derives from and adds a `Filename` property, which is what stores in the cache. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.GetInitializer Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public MustOverride Sub Initialize (initializer As Object)

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展使用缓存于 方法中的数据初始化其自身。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to initialize itself using the data cached in the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 扩展有三个机会来初始化数据，并且它们都具有不同的用途：A SOAP extension has three opportunities to initialize data and they all have different purposes: - 类构造函数的类构造函数在每次的 SOAP 扩展实例化并通常用于初始化成员变量时调用。Class constructor - The class constructor is called every time a SOAP extension is instantiated and is typically used to initialize member variables. - - 但是，调用只是一次，第一次的 SOAP 请求对 XML Web services 方法。 - , however, is called just once, the first time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web services method. 如果自定义特性应用于 XML Web 服务方法中，调用方法。If a custom attribute is applied to the XML Web service method, the method is invoked. 这可使 SOAP 扩展，以便询问的 XML Web 服务方法有关原型信息或要访问特定于扩展的数据由类派生自传递。This allows the SOAP extension to interrogate the of an XML Web service method for prototype information or to access extension-specific data passed by a class deriving from . 返回值可由 ASP.NET 缓存并传递给后续方法。The return value is cached by ASP.NET and passed into subsequent methods. 因此，在中执行的初始化封装实质上是一次性的性能问题。Therefore, initialization done in is encapsulated essentially into a one-time performance hit. - - 每次 SOAP 请求由 XML Web 服务方法，但有类构造函数，其优点在于时会调用在中初始化传递给它。 - is called every time a SOAP request is made to an XML Web service method, but has an advantage over the class constructor, in that the initialized in is passed to it. - > [!NOTE] > 你还可以通过以下方式添加的 SOAP 扩展而派生自不使用[ \ 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c)配置文件中。You can also add a SOAP extension without deriving from by using the [\ Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c) in a configuration file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ \ 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c)和[SOAP 消息修改使用 SOAP 扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95)。For details, see [\ Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a373a98-6d82-4f8d-a6fc-2996da3fd54c) and [SOAP Message Modification Using SOAP Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95). - ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用在过程缓存的数据方法。The following example demonstrates how you can use the data cached during the method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapExtension.Initialize Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public MustOverride Sub ProcessMessage (message As SoapMessage)

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，允许 SOAP 扩展接收要在每个 中处理的 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows a SOAP extension to receive a to process at each .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在所有调用应用于使用 ASP.NET 和它们的客户端创建这两个 XML Web 服务的 SOAP 扩展的阶段。 is called at all stages for SOAP extensions applied to both XML Web services created using ASP.NET and their clients. 在每个，派生自的类的实例传递给。At each , an instance of a class deriving from is passed to . 如果 SOAP 扩展是 XML Web 服务客户端上运行，则对象传递给; 否则为传入的对象。If the SOAP extension is running on the XML Web service client, then a object is passed into ; otherwise a object is passed in. ## Examples 下面的示例是日志 SOAP 请求和 SOAP 响应的 SOAP 扩展的部分。The following example is the portion of a SOAP extension that logs SOAP requests and SOAP responses. 通过登录在 ，SOAP 扩展访问以通过网络发送。By logging the at the , the SOAP extension accesses the to be sent over the wire. 如果 SOAP 扩展已应用到 XML Web 服务方法创建使用 ASP.NET，则包含来自 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 响应。If the SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service method created using ASP.NET, then the contains the SOAP response from the XML Web service method. 如果 SOAP 扩展应用于 XML Web 服务客户端，包含指向 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 请求。If the SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service client, the contains the SOAP request to an XML Web service method. 经典 SoapExtension.ProcessMessage 示例 #1Classic SoapExtension.ProcessMessage Example#1
